name: Tunnel of Dread
description:
——Beta.01——
Watch your light source, search for secrets, collect loot and stay alive! Watch out for wacky encounters and traps galore!

We are currently actively working on adding and polishing content. 

Have a suggestion? Want to have some input? Just say hello?  Join the server and tell us about it: https://discord.gg/uAAfCkZ

Like the Art and want to use it for an indie publication or other? Get in touch. It will soon be available as an asset pack on itch, all proceeds will go to support the team. 

Credits:

@phi-fell TechDreadWizard

@kirilot: Art&Design Gremlin

Accompanying sound(Still in progress) by: Sean Cilley
